actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to prohibit the President from increasing the price of certain crude oil by more than $1 per barrel per year.

summary.text: Prohibits the President, under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, from authorizing an increase in the ceiling price of old crude petroleum by more than one dollar per barrel per year. Prohibits any such increase before April 1, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to prohibit the President from increasing the price of certain crude oil by more than $1 per barrel per year.
